name: Up and Away
description:
Some horror, some fun, some floors, some strange things to happen... 

No one knows what kind of thng can happen here, it goes from falling floors to extremely long bridges...

If you wanna try this game you will need:

  • One flashlight;
  • A mobile phone;
  • Some stamina;
  • Clean pants;
  • Volume regulator for your headset;
  • And a lot of free time.

My mom get scared with this game O-O

Now, seriously talking, Up and Away is  a horror and fun game where you need to explore some floors and try to survive from a variety of things from just some dirty pants to a broken elevator.

What you will see in this game:

  1. 9 different floors;
  2. Some strange physics;
  3. Some cool horror parts;
  4. A lot of bugs;

What will you see in the future:

  1. 81 different floors;
  2. Bonus floors;
  3. More scary parts;
  4. Just some bugs;

This game is very tinely based in the elevator game from roblox.
